availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James B. Rawlins (Scott County, Kentucky, farmer. )

body.p: Scott County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah Rawlins. Father of Samuel Rawlins, John Rawlins, Sarah Rawlins, Francis Rawlins, Clementia Rawlins, James Rawlins, Edward B. Rawlins. Farmer in Scott County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, District 2, p. 485B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, District No 1, p. 916.
